name: Web Highlights - PDF & Web Highlighter
summary: Web highlighting extension that integrates GiveFreely affiliate platform to track browsing across 2000+ merchant domains. Performs geolocation tracking via MaxMind API with hardcoded credentials. Server-controlled configuration allows remote updates to tracked merchant list. Feature only enabled for Chrome users, not Firefox.

vulnerabilities.title: GiveFreely Affiliate Behavioral Tracking
vulnerabilities.description: Tracks browsing activity across thousands of e-commerce sites and generates affiliate URLs for cashback/charity purposes.

vulnerabilities.title: Geolocation Tracking with Hardcoded Credentials
vulnerabilities.description: Tracks user's country via MaxMind GeoIP API using hardcoded authorization credentials.

flags.description: GiveFreely affiliate SDK tracks browsing across 2000+ merchant domains and generates affiliate URLs
Remote config from cdn.givefreely.com allows dynamic update of tracked merchants without CWS review
